subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Stricker, a 48-year-old Wisconsin native and resident, will be playing in the P.G.A. Championship in his home state, where he is revered for his play and his philanthropy.
snippet: Stricker, a 48-year-old Wisconsin native and resident, will be playing in the P.G.A. Championship in his home state, where he is revered for his play and his philanthropy.
